accuracy.description: The accuracy of the solution, where a higher score indicates a more correct or complete solution.

clarity.description: The clarity of the solution, where a higher score indicates a solution that is easier to understand and follow.

efficiency.description: The efficiency of the solution, where a higher score indicates a solution that uses fewer steps or simpler methods.

completion.description: The percentage of the task completed, where a higher score indicates that a greater portion of the task has been solved.

response_time.description: The time taken to provide a solution, where shorter times indicate faster responses.
